name: Safari 15.6
available: macOS Big Sur and macOS Catalina

advisories.available: macOS Big Sur and macOS Catalina
advisories.impact: Processing web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved bounds checks.

cves.credit: Dongzhuo Zhao working with ADLab of Venustech, and ZhaoHai of Cyberpeace Tech Co., Ltd.

advisories.available: macOS Big Sur and macOS Catalina
advisories.impact: Visiting a maliciously crafted website may leak sensitive data
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved UI handling.

cves.credit: Young Min Kim of CompSec Lab at Seoul National University

advisories.available: macOS Big Sur and macOS Catalina
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.available: macOS Big Sur and macOS Catalina
advisories.impact: A user may be tracked through their IP address
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.available: macOS Big Sur and macOS Catalina
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.available: macOS Big Sur and macOS Catalina
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Manfred Paul (@_manfp) working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative

advisories.available: macOS Big Sur and macOS Catalina
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution.
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Jan Vojtesek of Avast Threat Intelligence team
